title: The Little Lantern
content: A small lantern felt sad because it was dim compared to the big street lamps. One rainy night, the lantern guided a lost kitten to its home. The lantern learned that even a little light can make a big difference.

title: Maya and the Secret Garden
content: Maya discovered a hidden garden behind an old wall. She watered the plants, and they grew into bright flowers. By caring for the garden, Maya found patience and joy in watching things grow.

title: The Honest Fox
content: A clever fox found a farmer's lost key. Instead of keeping it, the fox returned it and became friends with the farmer, who trusted the fox from then on. The fox learned that honesty builds friendship.

title: Tommy's Big Share
content: Tommy had a big bowl of cookies. His friends arrived hungry. Tommy decided to share even though he loved cookies. They all played together and felt happier. Sharing doubled the fun.

title: The Brave Little Cloud
content: A tiny cloud wanted to reach the mountain to say hello to the eagles. The wind was strong, but the cloud floated on. When it reached the peak, it sprinkled rain that helped flowers bloom. The cloud felt proud.

title: Lina's Listening Ears
content: Lina learned that listening carefully in class helped her understand lessons better. When her friend felt sad, Lina listened and helped find a solution. Listening made Lina a better friend and student.

title: The Little Seed That Could
content: A tiny seed worried it would never grow tall. It kept reaching for sunlight and drinking water. Over time, it grew into a strong tree that gave shade and fruit to everyone.

title: Sam and the Lost Star
content: Sam found a small star that had fallen into his backyard. He carried it back to the hill and placed it where it could shine. The star twinkled brighter, and Sam felt the warm glow of kindness.

title: Amina's Curious Hat
content: Amina wore a hat that made her curious about everything. She asked questions, explored books, and tried new things. Her curiosity opened doors to many wonderful discoveries.

title: The Helping Hands
content: In a small village, children formed a team to clean the park. Each small job made the park beautiful again. The community smiled, and the children learned that teamwork changes the world.

title: The Lost Toy and the New Friend
content: Emma lost her favorite toy and felt sad. A new classmate found it and returned it kindly. They became friends and played together every day. Emma learned that kindness builds friendships.

title: The Garden of Thanks
content: Children planted seeds and wrote one thing they were thankful for on a leaf. As the garden grew, they remembered the small things that made life beautiful and practiced gratitude every day.
